content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_sign
inventory=[{"type": "bowl", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 34, "index": 19}, {"type": "brown_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 31}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To make a jungle sign, I need to put three jungle planks in the top row of the crafting grid. I have 6 jungle planks in slot 31 so I will move one to slot 1 which is the top left corner of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_sign
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bowl", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 34, "index": 19}, {"type": "brown_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 31}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I have already placed a plank in the top left corner of the crafting grid, so I will now place a plank in the middle of the top row.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: I have already placed two planks in the top row of the crafting grid, so I will now place a plank in the rightmost corner of the top row.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 3 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "bowl", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 34, "index": 19}, {"type": "brown_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
